thread.title: What to Ask Your Adviser
thread.title_full: What to Ask Your Adviser - WSJ

author: Karen Damato
title: What to Ask Your Adviser
text:
As the stock market has tumbled in recent days, many financial advisers have reached out to reassure clients that periodic drops are inevitable and that making big changes amid tumult is often a bad idea.
Even investors who arenâ€™t unnerved by the market gyrations should consider having additional conversations with their advisers, to get a deeper...
